item.description:
Although we do have a new hall in which to meet, the details haven't been ironed out yet.

So... in the meantime, let's have a meet up at my house from 4:30 - 7:30 p.m.!

BRING A VEGETARIAN OR VEGAN DISH, DRINK OR DESSERT!
(and also enough copies of the recipe for 18 people)

This will be one of TWO (2) meet ups for March.

Directions to my home will be shared a day or two before.

SEE YOU THEN!

Peace & Hugs...

~Kerrie~
item.how_to_find_us: Directions will be shared before the event.

group.name: Rhode Island Vegetarian and Vegan Meetup Group

item.name: Pot Luck at Kerrie's Home!
